## text() function

Create a text node with chainable style methods.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function text(content: string): TextNode;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

content


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The text content to display


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[TextNode](./dsl.textnode.md)

A new [TextNode](./dsl.textnode.md)

## Remarks

Text nodes support fluent styling via methods like `bold()`<!-- -->, `dim()`<!-- -->, `italic()`<!-- -->, `foreground()`<!-- -->, and `background()`<!-- -->.

## Example


```typescript
text('Hello').bold().foreground('#ff79c6')
text('Warning').dim()
```
